Html:
Hi everybody!
Here's a chance to contribute to the project! I have created a Wikibook:
http://en.wikibooks.org/wiki/Irony_-_Language_Implementation_Kit
It is in fact an empty page - I think this is a minimum required to start a book; if something else is required, please let me know. Let's write it together! The idea is to create introduction/dev guide/crash course/inside-out - whatever you think may be useful for a newcomer. Everybody is welcome to contribute, let's finally start filling out the documentation void!
thank you all for you support, and thanks in advance for contributions!
Roman
PS Please do not document on Interpreter/runtime part, this is about to change soon. Everything in Parsing namespace is more-less stable.
